title: Lyric Theatre of Oklahoma – Summer 2026 Season
description: Lyric Theatre of Oklahoma is holding auditions for its 2026 summer season: Annie, Sister Act, and Sweeney Todd. Lyric works with Actors' Equity Association under URTA and Guest Artist contracts; union performers work alongside non-union company members. Lyric encourages and will consider actors from diverse backgrounds and genders for all roles. An accompanist is provided at all auditions; no a cappella singing unless specifically stated.
submissionDetails: Sign up via the links on Lyric's auditions page: Singer/Dancer (18+), Apprentice (2026 HS graduate and younger), and Youth (check page for availability). Prepare two contrasting songs in the style of the show (no longer than 1 minute each); bring sheet music. Bring one 8×10 headshot and resume, trimmed to size and stapled back to back. Video submissions: CastingCoordinator@LyricTheatreOKC.org. All inquiries: CastingCoordinator@LyricTheatreOKC.org.

roles.description: Annie, Sister Act, Sweeney Todd. Auditions Feb 21–26, 2026. Callbacks Feb 28–March 1. Rehearsals Tuesday–Sunday, 10am–6pm. Character breakdown and callback sides on Lyric's auditions page.
Apprentice sign-up via Lyric's auditions page. Kids & Apprentice auditions Sunday, Feb 22, 2026 at 1pm.

Female-presenting singers 18+ for Sister Act. Audition date: Feb 27, 2026. Prepare audition cut of "Raise Your Voice"; complete form on arrival (no headshot/resume needed). Accompanist provided. No virtual submissions. Sign up via Lyric's auditions page.
